history.content:
As you may have heard, the alcoves on the 6th floor will no longer be available to reserve after August 1, 2019. The space is being converted to faculty offices sometime during F19.

As a replacement for the lost space, we have two new alcove spaces on the 3rd floor of Soda Hall that can be reserved for class OH and tutoring for F19:

  • Soda 326
  • Soda 347

Standard reservation rules apply. You can view the room booking guidelines and calendars here: https://eecs.berkeley.edu/resources/facilities/room-reservations/book#soda_alcoves

P.S. Any requests for event taking place prior to August 26th will not be approved - Soda 326 is already fully committed for summer session.
history.subject: F19: New Alcoves in Soda Hall - for (u)GSIs and Tutors
